instructions.vehicle_number: 1-5, indicating which vehicle in the frame this row represents
instructions.has_vehicle: Y if this vehicle row is used (vehicle visible), N if unused
instructions.plate_text_gt: License plate text exactly as it appears (e.g., ABC1234)
instructions.plate_state: US state abbreviation if visible (e.g., CA, NY, TX)
instructions.vehicle_notes: Notes specific to this individual vehicle
instructions.frame_notes: Notes about the overall frame (fill for vehicle_number=1 only)
instructions.usage: Each frame has 5 rows. Use only the rows needed for vehicles in that frame.
